title: Substitution
text: Substitute the x- and y- values into the equation to check if the ordered pair is a solution to the equation.

title: Application
text: Substitute y for 2 and x for 0. Are 2 and $$\frac{1}{3\left(0\right)}+2$$ equal? If so, the ordered pair is a solution. If not, the ordered pair is not a solution.
